author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Montfort Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School hosted 21 institutions for the tercentenary observance of the origin of the Montfort Brothers of St. Gabriel (1715 – 2015), the death of St. Montfort (1716 -2016), and the annual inter-Montfortians Cultural Synergy 2015-16 recently.

The function commenced with reciting of the Rosary from Heritage Park at Echinkadu to Montfort school.

George, provincial superior; Varghese, principal and convener of the event; Augustine Novello, director; and the Montfort Brothers of various communities including Kerala, and Karnataka participated in the programmes.The cultural programmes consisted of skits, dance, dramas, and songs depicting the life of St. Montfort, and virtues that can be emulated by today’s youth.

Prizes were distributed for the best performances.
title: Tercentenary function
